Contains Classes to store the nets

nets.getMarking(tree)[source]¶

A function to extracting marking from parse tree

Parameters

tree (lark.tree.Tree) – A children of tree produced by parsing the .tpn file

Returns

a dictionary with places as keys, and list of token ages as value

Return type

dict[str,list[str]

addPlaces(listOfPlaces)[source]¶

Add places to the net

Parameters

listOFPlaces – adds a list of places to the net

addTrans(listOfTrans)[source]¶

Add transitions values to the transitions

Note

each transition is a tuple containing list of places involved, list of data values in increasing order, and input and output matrices Each matrix is a 2D dictionary, with place as first key, datum as second key and number of tokens with identity equal to datum coming from place as value.

Parameters

listOfTransitions (list[tuple[list[str],list[str],dict[str,dict[str,int]]],dict[str,dict[str,int]]]]) – adds a list of transitions to the net

adddata(listOfdata)[source]¶

Add data values to the transitions

Parameters

listOfData (list[str]) – adds a list of data values to the net

adds list of places to the net

Parameters

addTrans(listOfTrans)[source]¶

adds list of transitions to the net

A transition is a tuple containnig name, list of input arcs, list of output arcs An arc is a tuple containing place, type(singular or interval), endpoints of interval, and identifier

Note: the endpoints of interval is a list with single item if type is singular, and a list with two items if type is interval :type listOfTrans: list[tuple(str,list[str,str,list[typing.Union[int,double]],str],list[tuple(str,list[str,str,list[typing.Union[int,double]],str]] :param listOfTrans: list of Transitions to be added in the net

readFromFile(filename)[source]¶

creates a tdpn class from a .tpn file

Parameters

filename (str) – the location of .tpn file relavtive to current directory, or the absolute path of the file

timedToData.divide(trans)[source]¶

helper function to create multiple transitions with one transition

each arc in the result is either singular or open interval of length 1

Returns

Return type
